segments.text: Excuse me , I'd like to make a suit of this material .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sir . Can I take your measurements first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Should I take off my coat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That'll be helpful . All right , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , problem . If you'll wait one moment , I'll make out your receipt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see , with padding and lining cloth , it comes to 357 dollars altogether .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . When can I get it ?
segments.speaker: S1
